content.d: Welcome, Mari-san. I see you didn’t come by helicopter today.
Yeah. I forgot to get permission from the school administration beforehand.
So, Shioriko, the aerial trapeze we did on my helicopter before was fun, right?
Uh... Was it... fun? I’m sorry. My memory is a bit hazy...
You were squealing so much and looked like you were enjoying yourself! I enjoyed it too. So let’s do it again today!
Huh!? Didn’t you say you didn’t come here by helicopter!?
I came by helicopter and landed at a nearby heliport! Odaiba has everything, huh! Come on, let’s go, Shioriko!!
Wait, uh, Mari-san! Did I really enjoy the aerial trapeze!?
Yes, very much! You were calling out your sister’s name at some point, but you seemed to be having fun!
Ah... Now that you mention it, I felt like I saw you and my sister’s faces overlapping...
I see! I got it! Shioriko, you must have wanted your sister to join us on the aerial trapeze, too, right? Leave it to me! I’ll invite your sister as well!~
